user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, stylish, and reliable everyday clothing that fits well.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a pair of pants that offered a tailored look and comfort for everyday wear. The wrinkle-free fabric and flat-front design were appealing features that suggested ease of maintenance and style. However, the inconsistent sizing mentioned in the reviews ultimately led to my decision to return them, as they did not fit as expected.

I needed affordable and reliable everyday clothing, and the description highlighted the focus on quality and consistent sizing. However, the fit was not as expected, resembling low-rise jeans, which made them uncomfortable and led me to return the item.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing items that offer a good fit, comfort, and quality materials. I appreciate products that are versatile and can be worn for various occasions, whether for casual wear or layering. Softness and breathability are important to me, as I enjoy items that feel good against the skin. Additionally, I value durability and the ability to maintain their shape after washing. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not fit as expected, particularly those that feel undersized or have inconsistent sizing. I also find it frustrating when products shrink significantly after washing or when the quality does not meet my expectations, especially if they feel less substantial than previous purchases. Overall, I look for reliable, comfortable clothing that fits well and lasts over time.

With these classics-and T-shirts, polo shirts, and outerwear to round out your look-Goodthreads is your go-to for wardrobe staples with the style you want."]
